header.name: whitelabel.
header.tagline: Release your music as an NFT.

royalties.title: Royalties
royalties.description: Here you can set a royalty percentage for every secondary sale.

stakeholders.title: Splits
stakeholders.description: You can split any earnings between multiple wallets. You can allocate a maximum of 100 shares. Each share equates to 1% of all earnings for this release.

attributes.title: Attributes
attributes.description: Add attributes to your release. This will help users find your release in the market.
